function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shift in sex ratio of later cases without reported travel history","Impact":"Increase in local transmission risk","Mitigation":"Implement strict quarantine measures for all individuals with suspected exposure to the virus","Technologies":"Advanced contact tracing and surveillance technology","People":"Population in the affected area","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Cases with no known travel history contributing to disseminating SARS-CoV-2 outside of Wuhan","Impact":"Widespread dissemination of the virus in other regions","Mitigation":"Implement travel restrictions and rigorous screening measures at transportation hubs","Technologies":"Thermal scanners and rapid testing kits","People":"Travelers and local residents in non-Wuhan regions","Owner":"Government and transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Containment of respiratory infections characterized by mild symptoms or pre-symptomatic transmission","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling the spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Promote widespread adoption of personal protective measures, such as mask-wearing and hand hygiene","Technologies":"Public health education campaigns and distribution of protective equipment","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health agencies and local authorities"}]}
